LanguageData.Toxalope.label: toxalope
LanguageData.Toxalope.description: A pollution-adapted cousin of the boomalope, the toxalope grows toxic pouches on its back. When it dies, the toxic material explodes and produces a deadly toxic cloud. Unlike the boomalope, the toxalope cannot be milked.
LanguageData.Toxalope.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Toxalope.tools.left_hoof.label: left hoof
LanguageData.Toxalope.tools.right_hoof.label: right hoof
LanguageData.WasteRat.label: waste rat
LanguageData.WasteRat.description: A toxin-adapted variant of the common rat. Waste rats have evolved to be pollution-resistant, as well as larger, tougher, and more aggressive than standard rats. Their bite infects their attacker with toxic buildup.
LanguageData.WasteRat.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.WasteRat.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.WasteRat.tools.head.label: head
